item.title: TeX Support in Hugo
item.description: In this post I want to show how you can add and properly render TeX code in your Hugo blog. Chances are that you are already familiar with Hugo and with how everything works. If you are not, that’s no problem, you can simply follow this tutorial step by step. First of all, we create a file called katex.html inside the partials folder which you can find in the layouts folder.
